name: TC_003: Increase Quantity and Validate Total

statusDetails.message:
Expected messages to contain: '
You have added Product 8 to your shopping cart!
 OR 
You have modified your shopping cart!
 OR 
Product already in cart with desired quantity!', but got: 
'' expected [true] but found [false]
